title: Amy Adams keeps it comfortable in striped maxi dress and sandals while out with daughter Aviana
text:
Amy Adams kept it casual Sunday while spending some quality time with her daughter Aviana in West Hollywood, California.

The 45-year-old actress donned a dark striped maxi dress and sandals while stepping out with her nine-year-old daughter.

Amy covered up with a long, grey sweater and had a brown leather purse on a cross-body strap.

Doting mom: Amy Adams wore a striped maxi dress Sunday while out and about with her daughter Aviana in West Hollywood, California

The six-time Oscar nominee had her long red hair down in soft curls around her shoulders and accessorized with sunglasses.

Aviana wore a black T-shirt over speckled leggings and brown hiking boots.

Amy and husband Darren Le Gallo, 45, welcomed Aviana in May 2010.

The actress recently picked up her first nomination for an Emmy award.

Hollywood star: The 45-year-old actress has earned six Oscar nominations during her career

Only child: Amy and husband Darren Le Gallo welcomed their only child Aviana in May 2010

She portrayed alcoholic reporter Camille Preaker in the critically acclaimed HBO series Sharp Objects based on the novel of the same name by Gillian Flynn.

The series follows Camille who after recently being discharged from a psychiatric hospital returns to her hometown to investigate the murder of a teenage girl.

Amy for her portrayal of Camille was nominated for Outstanding Lead Actress In A Series Or Movie at the 71st Primetime Emmy Awards held last month in Los Angeles.

Emmy nomination: Darren escorted wife Amy to the Primetime Emmy Awards last month in Los Angeles where she was nominated for her work in the HBO series Sharp Objects

The award went to Michelle Williams for her portrayal of Gwen Verdon in the FX series Fosse/Verdon.

Amy met her husband Darren in 2001 at an acting class.

The got married in 2015 during a small ceremony at a friend's house near Santa Barbara, California.
